src:
UP mener innføring av metrobuss gir høyere fart på Heimdal
07 Nov 2019, 16:17 by Camilla Kilnes,Ann Iren Bævre
20 sjåfører kjørte for fort ved Åsheim skole i Heimdal. UP mener farten har økt etter at fartshumpene ble fjernet da metrobussen kom.
Politiet i Trøndelag melder torsdag ettermiddag på Twitter at Utrykningspolitiet (UP) har hatt fartskontroll i en 30-sone ved Åsheim skole i Heimdal. Her ble det gitt tilsammen 19 forenklede forelegg for høy fart, og høyeste hastighet ble målt til 49 kilometer i timen.
text:
UP believes that the introduction of the metro bus will give Heimdal higher speed
07 Nov 2019, 16:17 by Camilla Kilnes, Ann Iren Beaver
20 drivers drove too fast at Åsheim school in Heimdal. UP believes speed has increased after the speed bumps were removed when the metro bus arrived.
On Thursday afternoon, police in Trøndelag reported on Twitter that the Uprising police (UP) had speed control in a 30-zone at Åsheim school in Heimdal. Here, a total of 19 simplified submissions were given for high speed, and the highest speed was measured at 49 kilometers per hour.
